content: 1 YEAR EDITION MOON PASS FINE SILVER 999.9 PT.2Hello everyone ! i hope you all are fine !! As you know the MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION was first on sale for the MOON PASS Original hodlers, the remaining MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION are auctioned to the public, like it was say on the 1HoDLCUB Q2 2022 Thread, then the first public auction was made there, Today is the 2nd auction for 7 MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION, the numbers: 13/50 ; 19/50; 27/50 ; 28/50 ; 29/50 ; 34/50 ; 43/50 .Exactly the same size as the MOON PASS and 85 x 54 mm and 1.3mm but this time 65g of Fine Silver! Like its predecessor there is only 50 editions! On the front we can find the design of the MOON PASS with the serial numbers at the top left and the denomination on the top right. further down we can find the 1HoDLCLUB stamp with the indication of the weight and the material.Due to the special format and thickness of the card used to make this Fine silver 999.9 card, the cards may have minor flaws on the edges, but nothing serious.on the back we can find the same hologram as there was on the original MOON PASS, in its window we see the QR code of the BTC public key and below the private key!, for this edition all the BTC public keys begin with "1Moon... " and each MOON PASS is loaded with 0.0021 BTC.the auction begins at the initial sale price. selling price at the hodler.Good luck to everyone !  1 YEAR EDITION MOON PASS Fine Silver 999.9Mintage : 50 [7 auctionned here, 5 Autionned at May 27, 2022]Material : 999.9 Fine SilverSize : 85x54mmThickness : 1.3mmWeight : 65grDenomination : 0.0021BTC Serial auctionned today:  13/50 ; 19/50; 27/50 ; 28/50 ; 29/50 ; 34/50 ; 43/50.Starting Bid : (the bidding don't include the loading)Each lot bears the serial number of the MOON PASS at auctionLot#13 : 0.016BTCLot#19 : 0.016BTCLot#27 : 0.016BTCLot#28 : 0.016BTCLot#29 : 0.016BTCLot#34 : 0.016BTCLot#43 : 0.016BTCMinimum Bid Increments: 0.001BTCLoading : the loading amount of 0.0021 BTC are not included in the bidding,it should be added to this one at the end of the auction during the payments!Auction Ends: June 24, 2022 @ 9pm UTCCountdown:MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION AUCTION PT.2 COUNTDOWNSniping:  No sniping, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutesShipping: 16$ [Priority + Tracking] Reference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address13     1MoonxDsSTp9HUWDXmgakfaaF72t8i6Z1B19     1MoonxXSWRcaAQ27J4yqWMRmR8tsxfeuEm27     1MoonxFXXWW8KB4agqKuN1G8gHqfdf24Bg28     1Moonxse1dLRyGSjcUW5y5y9jPgeQ5kfrs29     1MoonxRgZFzJW2mttLL3AVbqiEg51TduEp34     1MoonxcoNjVqiBu3jQadvrTn5zqbCyRPLY43     1MoonxAWkYo4EPJ7a1M1EbGE6qoQXUnsPS1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store OPENTwitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me

comments.body: Thought id post a pic of what a full moon pass set looks like. Its a great collectors piece. Even if you dont have the original. Get the silver and find the original later. The moon pass was hodlclubs first offering in case you didnt know.
